./.title: Welcome
./.body:
Viasun Hubspot Theme Documentation
This is documentation for Viasun Hubspot theme.
I would like to thank you for purchasing the theme.

This theme is developed by Bolvo.com
Lets get started...

important.html.title: Important
important.html.body:
Introduction
Steps to get help

Please check for the solution in appropriate page on This document, if not found please check on FAQ page on bottom of this page.
Please check online version of this document here, there are chances I have updated it after you downloaded the theme.
Create ticket https://bolvo.com/support/ (Do not forget to provide your themeforest purchase key for speedy reply. )

Thanks so much in advance for cooperation!

installation.html.title: Installation
installation.html.body:
Installation
I assume you already know how to install themes on Hubspot, if you do not, please check official Hubspot guide for the basic concepts, installation and usage of themes.  https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes
Uploading Viasun Theme
Before moving to installation, we first need to upload theme to Hubspot.

Download theme from Themeforest.
Unzip that folder on your local PC/Mac
Inside that folder, you will find a zip viasun.zip. (this is the Hubspot theme)
Go to your hubspot dashboard, Click on the settings icon on right top, then locate and click on Website > Themes from left panel.
Upload theme using the Top right corner Upload button.

 
More info and official guide : https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes
You can also visit below Video, that shows how to upload zip of the theme to Hubspot. https://www.loom.com/share/0760234dcc514828a34733d19e9eea81

Feel free to contact us if you have any trouble.

theme-components.html.title: Basics & Theme Components
theme-components.html.body:
Theme Components
There are 4 main theme components.
Templates: a set of templates for your website, including a homepage, about page, landing page, and blog templates.
Modules: a set of unique theme modules you can add and customize on any page template in that theme.
Theme settings: default settings for your theme's templates, including fonts, spacing, and colors.
Global content: theme templates include global content , like your website footer, which is repeated on multiple pages.

setup-global-styles.html.title: Global theme styles
setup-global-styles.html.body:
Global Theme Styles - Setting up theme settings.
The first step should be to setup brand colors, fonts and other styles at the ready. This is going to save you a lot of time and keep your site cohesive.
Here are the steps to do so:

Create a new page and in the page editor, navigate to the Design tab. 

Select “edit theme settings.

Set all of your theme settings to determine your website’s styles.

Set your logo, spacing, typography, buttons etc as well.


More info & Official guide : https://knowledge.hubspot.com/website-pages/edit-your-global-theme-settings

homepage-setup.html.title: Setup your Homepage
homepage-setup.html.body:
Homepage Setup
Here are the steps to do so:

Log in to Hubspot, from the top panel, go to Marketing > Website > Website Pages.

From the top right corner button, click Create > Website page

On next page, select the Viasun theme.

On next page, select the Home template.

Give this new page a name, eg Homepage.

Click Create page button.


Once you finish above steps, the Page will load with default modules, and populated with demo content, you can then point, click and edit the content to suit your needs. You can also drag/drop other modules as needed from the left panel, as well as you can delete the unneeded modules by hovering them on the page editor.

main_menu/header.html.title: Setup Header & Menu
main_menu/header.html.body:
Setup Header
While you are on the Homepage, from the previous step, click on the Header to edit the header.
You will see a popup to Open Global content editor, click on it.
On further page, you will see option to edit the header. That includes, uploading a logo, editing the Menu bar, Top menu bar and so on.

setup-footer.html.title: Setup Footer
setup-footer.html.body:
Setup Footer
Same as done with the header, click on the Footer area from the Page editor, to open the Footer Global editor panel.
From next page, you can edit the footer elements as needed.

setup-other-pages.html.title: Setup other pages
setup-other-pages.html.body:
Setup Other Pages.
Here are the steps to do so:

Log in to Hubspot, from the top panel, go to Marketing > Website > Website Pages.

From the top right corner button, click Create > Website page

On next page, select the Viasun theme.

On next page, select the appropriate template for your page, for example, for About page, choose About.

Give this new page a name, eg About.

Click Create page button.


Once you finish above steps, the Page will load with default modules, and populated with demo content, you can then point, click and edit the content to suit your needs. You can also drag/drop other modules as needed from the left panel, as well as you can delete the unneeded modules by hovering them on the page editor.

setup-system-pages.html.title: Setup Blog
setup-system-pages.html.body:
Setup Blog pages
Please follow below steps to setup the blog
Log in to Hubspot, from the top panel, go to Marketing > Website > Website Pages.

From the top right corner button, click Create > Blog post

Enter the title and the content.for this post.


Apply the template for Blog post and Blog listing page.
To apply the Viasun blog templates to above created blog post and the blog listing page, please follow below steps.

Click on the settings icon on right top corner.
From the left panel, Locate Website > Blog
From the second tab Template, select and apply the  Viasun templates for Blog post and Blog listing page.

editing-contact-forms.html.title: Setup System pages
editing-contact-forms.html.body:
Setup System pages
Viasun theme comes with handful of System pages such as 404 error page, Password Prompt page, Search result page etc. To apply the appropriate template to appropriate page. Please follow below steps.

Click on the settings icon on right top corner.
From the left panel, Locate Website > Blog
From the second tab Template, select and apply the  Viasun templates for Blog post and Blog listing page.

credits-and-other-info.html.title: Credits and Other info
credits-and-other-info.html.body:
Credits
Fonts used are: Poppins & Open Sans.
Icons used are: Fontawesome 5 Free.
Images are not part of the item, and are not included in the package.
